mapper.select: SELECT ID, ROOM_ID, SENDER, MESSAGE, TIMESTAMP, del_yn, create_id, TO_CHAR(create_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS create_dt, update_id, TO_CHAR(update_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS update_dt FROM ZTHH_CHAT where ROOM_ID = #{roomId} AND del_yn='N' ORDER BY update_dt, create_dt DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ZTHH_CHAT where ROOM_ID = #{roomId} AND del_yn='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZTHH_CHAT (ID, ROOM_ID, SENDER, MESSAGE, TIMESTAMP, del_yn, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt) VALUES (#{id}, #{roomId}, #{sender}, #{message}, #{timestamp}, 'N', #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updateId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: UPDATE ZTHH_CHAT SET del_yn = 'Y', update_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
